text:
I'm part of AWAI, they suggest $450-10k for sales copy for a landing page. So yes, most folks definitely undercharge. Anything less than $1k is for a blog or article.

But i dont know, it depends on how much you want to make in a month and how good you are at it. Charge according to that. How much you wanna make per project and if you can actually deliver results.
